CustomField.description: Per Section 2 of the RLP, Fire Protection and Life Safety, the property meets OR does not meet the Lease fire/life safety standards. * attach appropriate documentation in the Attachments tab.
CustomField.label: Offeror FLS Declaration

value.fullName: the property meets the Lease fire/life safety standards.
value.label: the property meets the Lease fire/life safety standards.

value.fullName: does not meet the Lease fire/life safety standards.
value.label: does not meet the Lease fire/life safety standards.
